mapper.select: SELECT d.*, td.*, e.*, u.ubig_id, u.ubig_cod_dpto || u.ubig_cod_prov || u.ubig_cod_dist AS ubig_codigo, u.ubig_departamento, u.ubig_provincia, u.ubig_distrito, p.*, es.sucu_id AS sucu_emisor_id, es.sucu_nombre_legal AS sucu_emisor_nombrelegal, es.sucu_direccion AS sucu_emisor_direccion, es.sucu_urbanizacion AS sucu_emisor_urbanizacion, es.sucu_status AS sucu_emisor_status, su.ubig_id AS sucu_emisor_ubig_id, su.ubig_cod_dpto || su.ubig_cod_prov || su.ubig_cod_dist AS sucu_emisor_ubig_codigo, su.ubig_departamento AS sucu_emisor_ubig_dpto, su.ubig_provincia AS sucu_emisor_ubig_prov, su.ubig_distrito AS sucu_emisor_ubig_dist, sp.pais_codigo AS sucu_emisor_pais_codigo, sp.pais_nombre AS sucu_emisor_pais_nombre, m.*, c.cont_id AS clie_id, c.cont_num_doc AS clie_numDoc, c.cont_nombre_legal AS clie_nombreLeg, c.cont_nombre_comercial AS clie_nombreCom, c.cont_direccion AS clie_direccion, c.cont_urbanizacion AS clie_urbanizacion, cu.ubig_id AS clie_ubig_id, cu.ubig_cod_dpto || cu.ubig_cod_prov || cu.ubig_cod_dist AS clie_ubig_codigo, cu.ubig_departamento AS clie_ubig_dpto, cu.ubig_provincia AS clie_ubig_prov, cu.ubig_distrito AS clie_ubig_dist, cp.pais_codigo AS clie_pais_codigo, cp.pais_nombre AS clie_pais_nombre, cs.sucu_id AS sucu_clie_id, cs.sucu_nombre_legal AS sucu_clie_nombrelegal, cs.sucu_direccion AS sucu_clie_direccion, cs.sucu_urbanizacion AS sucu_clie_urbanizacion, cs.sucu_status AS sucu_clie_status, csu.ubig_id AS sucu_clie_ubig_id, csu.ubig_cod_dpto || csu.ubig_cod_prov || csu.ubig_cod_dist AS sucu_clie_ubig_codigo, csu.ubig_departamento AS sucu_clie_ubig_dpto, csu.ubig_provincia AS sucu_clie_ubig_prov, csu.ubig_distrito AS sucu_clie_ubig_dist, csp.pais_codigo AS sucu_clie_pais_codigo, csp.pais_nombre AS sucu_clie_pais_nombre, top.*, dr.*, l.*, tl.*, dd.* FROM sunqubit.documentos AS d INNER JOIN sunqubit.tipos_documentos AS td ON td.tido_codigo = d.tido_codigo INNER JOIN sunqubit.contribuyentes AS e ON e.cont_id = d.cont_id INNER JOIN sunqubit.ubigeos AS u ON u.ubig_id = e.ubig_id INNER JOIN sunqubit.paises AS p ON p.pais_codigo = e.pais_codigo LEFT JOIN sunqubit.sucursales AS es ON es.sucu_id = d.sucu_emisor_id LEFT JOIN sunqubit.ubigeos AS su ON su.ubig_id = es.ubig_id LEFT JOIN sunqubit.paises AS sp ON sp.pais_codigo = es.pais_codigo INNER JOIN sunqubit.monedas AS m ON m.mone_codigo = d.mone_codigo INNER JOIN sunqubit.contribuyentes AS c ON c.cont_id = d.cont_clie_id LEFT JOIN sunqubit.ubigeos AS cu ON cu.ubig_id = c.ubig_id INNER JOIN sunqubit.paises AS cp ON cp.pais_codigo = c.pais_codigo LEFT JOIN sunqubit.sucursales AS cs ON cs.sucu_id = d.sucu_clie_id LEFT JOIN sunqubit.ubigeos AS csu ON csu.ubig_id = cs.ubig_id LEFT JOIN sunqubit.paises AS csp ON csp.pais_codigo = cs.pais_codigo INNER JOIN sunqubit.tipos_operaciones AS top ON top.tiop_codigo = d.tiop_codigo LEFT JOIN sunqubit.documentos_referenciados AS dr ON dr.documentos_docu_id = d.docu_id INNER JOIN sunqubit.leyendas AS l ON l.docu_id = d.docu_id INNER JOIN sunqubit.tipos_leyendas AS tl ON tl.tley_codigo = l.tley_codigo LEFT JOIN sunqubit.detalle_documentos AS dd ON dd.docu_id = d.docu_id WHERE d.docu_id = #{docuId} AND (d.tido_codigo = '01' OR d.tido_codigo = '03');

SELECT d.*, td.*, e.*, u.ubig_id, u.ubig_cod_dpto || u.ubig_cod_prov || u.ubig_cod_dist AS ubig_codigo, u.ubig_departamento, u.ubig_provincia, u.ubig_distrito, p.*, es.sucu_id AS sucu_emisor_id, es.sucu_nombre_legal AS sucu_emisor_nombrelegal, es.sucu_direccion AS sucu_emisor_direccion, es.sucu_urbanizacion AS sucu_emisor_urbanizacion, es.sucu_status AS sucu_emisor_status, su.ubig_id AS sucu_emisor_ubig_id, su.ubig_cod_dpto || su.ubig_cod_prov || su.ubig_cod_dist AS sucu_emisor_ubig_codigo, su.ubig_departamento AS sucu_emisor_ubig_dpto, su.ubig_provincia AS sucu_emisor_ubig_prov, su.ubig_distrito AS sucu_emisor_ubig_dist, sp.pais_codigo AS sucu_emisor_pais_codigo, sp.pais_nombre AS sucu_emisor_pais_nombre, m.*, c.cont_id AS clie_id, c.cont_num_doc AS clie_numDoc, c.cont_nombre_legal AS clie_nombreLeg, c.cont_nombre_comercial AS clie_nombreCom, c.cont_direccion AS clie_direccion, c.cont_urbanizacion AS clie_urbanizacion, cu.ubig_id AS clie_ubig_id, cu.ubig_cod_dpto || cu.ubig_cod_prov || cu.ubig_cod_dist AS clie_ubig_codigo, cu.ubig_departamento AS clie_ubig_dpto, cu.ubig_provincia AS clie_ubig_prov, cu.ubig_distrito AS clie_ubig_dist, cp.pais_codigo AS clie_pais_codigo, cp.pais_nombre AS clie_pais_nombre, cs.sucu_id AS sucu_clie_id, cs.sucu_nombre_legal AS sucu_clie_nombrelegal, cs.sucu_direccion AS sucu_clie_direccion, cs.sucu_urbanizacion AS sucu_clie_urbanizacion, cs.sucu_status AS sucu_clie_status, csu.ubig_id AS sucu_clie_ubig_id, csu.ubig_cod_dpto || csu.ubig_cod_prov || csu.ubig_cod_dist AS sucu_clie_ubig_codigo, csu.ubig_departamento AS sucu_clie_ubig_dpto, csu.ubig_provincia AS sucu_clie_ubig_prov, csu.ubig_distrito AS sucu_clie_ubig_dist, csp.pais_codigo AS sucu_clie_pais_codigo, csp.pais_nombre AS sucu_clie_pais_nombre, top.*, dr.*, l.*, tl.*, dd.* FROM sunqubit.documentos AS d INNER JOIN sunqubit.tipos_documentos AS td ON td.tido_codigo = d.tido_codigo INNER JOIN sunqubit.contribuyentes AS e ON e.cont_id = d.cont_id INNER JOIN sunqubit.ubigeos AS u ON u.ubig_id = e.ubig_id INNER JOIN sunqubit.paises AS p ON p.pais_codigo = e.pais_codigo LEFT JOIN sunqubit.sucursales AS es ON es.sucu_id = d.sucu_emisor_id LEFT JOIN sunqubit.ubigeos AS su ON su.ubig_id = es.ubig_id LEFT JOIN sunqubit.paises AS sp ON sp.pais_codigo = es.pais_codigo INNER JOIN sunqubit.monedas AS m ON m.mone_codigo = d.mone_codigo INNER JOIN sunqubit.contribuyentes AS c ON c.cont_id = d.cont_clie_id LEFT JOIN sunqubit.ubigeos AS cu ON cu.ubig_id = c.ubig_id INNER JOIN sunqubit.paises AS cp ON cp.pais_codigo = c.pais_codigo LEFT JOIN sunqubit.sucursales AS cs ON cs.sucu_id = d.sucu_clie_id LEFT JOIN sunqubit.ubigeos AS csu ON csu.ubig_id = cs.ubig_id LEFT JOIN sunqubit.paises AS csp ON csp.pais_codigo = cs.pais_codigo INNER JOIN sunqubit.tipos_operaciones AS top ON top.tiop_codigo = d.tiop_codigo LEFT JOIN sunqubit.documentos_referenciados AS dr ON dr.documentos_docu_id = d.docu_id INNER JOIN sunqubit.leyendas AS l ON l.docu_id = d.docu_id INNER JOIN sunqubit.tipos_leyendas AS tl ON tl.tley_codigo = l.tley_codigo LEFT JOIN sunqubit.detalle_documentos AS dd ON dd.docu_id = d.docu_id WHERE d.docu_numero = #{numDoc} AND d.cont_id = #{emprId} AND d.tido_codigo = #{tidoc};

SELECT d.*, td.*, e.*, u.ubig_id, u.ubig_cod_dpto || u.ubig_cod_prov || u.ubig_cod_dist AS ubig_codigo, u.ubig_departamento, u.ubig_provincia, u.ubig_distrito, p.*, es.sucu_id, es.sucu_nombre_legal, es.sucu_direccion, es.sucu_urbanizacion, es.sucu_status, su.ubig_id AS sucu_ubig_id, su.ubig_cod_dpto || su.ubig_cod_prov || su.ubig_cod_dist AS sucu_ubig_codigo, su.ubig_departamento AS sucu_ubig_dpto, su.ubig_provincia AS sucu_ubig_prov, su.ubig_distrito AS sucu_ubig_dist, sp.pais_codigo AS sucu_pais_codigo, sp.pais_nombre AS sucu_pais_nombre, m.*, dr.docu_id AS docu_asociado_id, dr.docu_numero AS docu_asociado_numero, dr.docu_fecha_emision AS docu_asociado_fechaEmi, tn.* FROM sunqubit.documentos AS d INNER JOIN sunqubit.tipos_documentos AS td ON td.tido_codigo = d.tido_codigo INNER JOIN sunqubit.contribuyentes AS e ON e.cont_id = d.cont_id INNER JOIN sunqubit.ubigeos AS u ON u.ubig_id = e.ubig_id INNER JOIN sunqubit.paises AS p ON p.pais_codigo = e.pais_codigo LEFT JOIN sunqubit.sucursales AS es ON es.sucu_id = d.sucu_emisor_id LEFT JOIN sunqubit.ubigeos AS su ON su.ubig_id = es.ubig_id LEFT JOIN sunqubit.paises AS sp ON sp.pais_codigo = es.pais_codigo INNER JOIN sunqubit.monedas AS m ON m.mone_codigo = d.mone_codigo INNER JOIN sunqubit.tipos_notas AS tn ON tn.tino_id = d.tino_id LEFT JOIN sunqubit.documentos_referenciados AS dri ON dri.documentos_docu_id = d.docu_id LEFT JOIN sunqubit.documentos AS dr ON dr.docu_id = dri.docu_asociado_id WHERE d.docu_id = #{docuId} AND (d.tido_codigo = '07' OR d.tido_codigo = '08');

SELECT d.*, td.*, e.*, u.ubig_id, u.ubig_cod_dpto || u.ubig_cod_prov || u.ubig_cod_dist AS ubig_codigo, u.ubig_departamento, u.ubig_provincia, u.ubig_distrito, p.*, es.sucu_id, es.sucu_nombre_legal, es.sucu_direccion, es.sucu_urbanizacion, es.sucu_status, su.ubig_id AS sucu_ubig_id, su.ubig_cod_dpto || su.ubig_cod_prov || su.ubig_cod_dist AS sucu_ubig_codigo, su.ubig_departamento AS sucu_ubig_dpto, su.ubig_provincia AS sucu_ubig_prov, su.ubig_distrito AS sucu_ubig_dist, sp.pais_codigo AS sucu_pais_codigo, sp.pais_nombre AS sucu_pais_nombre, m.*, dr.docu_id AS docu_asociado_id, dr.docu_numero AS docu_asociado_numero, dr.docu_fecha_emision AS docu_asociado_fechaEmi, tn.* FROM sunqubit.documentos AS d INNER JOIN sunqubit.tipos_documentos AS td ON td.tido_codigo = d.tido_codigo INNER JOIN sunqubit.contribuyentes AS e ON e.cont_id = d.cont_id INNER JOIN sunqubit.ubigeos AS u ON u.ubig_id = e.ubig_id INNER JOIN sunqubit.paises AS p ON p.pais_codigo = e.pais_codigo LEFT JOIN sunqubit.sucursales AS es ON es.sucu_id = d.sucu_emisor_id LEFT JOIN sunqubit.ubigeos AS su ON su.ubig_id = es.ubig_id LEFT JOIN sunqubit.paises AS sp ON sp.pais_codigo = es.pais_codigo INNER JOIN sunqubit.monedas AS m ON m.mone_codigo = d.mone_codigo INNER JOIN sunqubit.tipos_notas AS tn ON tn.tino_id = d.tino_id LEFT JOIN sunqubit.documentos_referenciados AS dri ON dri.documentos_docu_id = d.docu_id LEFT JOIN sunqubit.documentos AS dr ON dr.docu_id = dri.docu_asociado_id WHERE d.docu_numero = #{numDoc} AND d.cont_id = #{emprId} AND d.tido_codigo = #{tidoc};
